titleStmt.title: The honour of the magistrate asserted In a sermon preached at the assizes holden at Lincoln on Monday, March the 23. 1673/4. By Thomas Lodington, M.A. Sometimes fellow of Magdalen Colledge in Cambridge, and now rector of Welby in the county of Lincoln.
titleStmt.author: Lodington, Thomas, 1621-1692.

titleStmt.title: The honour of the magistrate asserted In a sermon preached at the assizes holden at Lincoln on Monday, March the 23. 1673/4. By Thomas Lodington, M.A. Sometimes fellow of Magdalen Colledge in Cambridge, and now rector of Welby in the county of Lincoln.
titleStmt.author: Lodington, Thomas, 1621-1692.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Robert Clavel, at the sign of the Peacock, in St. Pauls Church yard,

notesStmt.note: Caption title on p. 1 reads: An assize-sermon.
Reproduction of the original in the Magdalene College Library, Cambridge.
